data.meanings: became cheerful/happy, free from straitness/burden, enjoy, to jest/laugh/joke, be amused/pleased, entertain, fruit, wonderment, indulge in pleasantry, rejoice, admiration.
data.sentence: The word وَفَاكِهَةً comes from the root ف ك ه and is associated with the meanings: became cheerful/happy, free from straitness/burden, enjoy, to jest/laugh/joke, be amused/pleased, entertain, fruit, wonderment, indulge in pleasantry, rejoice, admiration.

data.meanings: fresh or dry herbage/vegetation of earth/pasture, fruits/vegetables
data.sentence: The word وَأَبًّا comes from the root ا ب ب and is associated with the meanings: fresh or dry herbage/vegetation of earth/pasture, fruits/vegetables
